name: Lignum Vitae
description:
get those damn evil orbs off your mountain

make sure they don’t infect the holy tree at the summit

dashing and ground pounding creates a shockwave
use it to push the orbs away from your sacred tree

Move….WASD
Aim…..Mouse Jump….Space Dash….LMB
Pound…RMB

numbers at the top show active and defeated enemies
in case you get out of bounds press backspace to reset

i might have forgotten to disable a debug command so if the early waves are too slow for you try pressing x to immediately spawn an additional wave
